definition: Sanlu Group, Chinese state-owned dairy products company involved in the 2008 melamine poisoning scandal

sentences.english: They cite the misdeeds of one well-known Sanlu poisonous milk powder incident.
sentences.chinese: 他們列舉的劣行其一三鹿毒奶粉事件世人皆知。

sentences.english: After the Sanlu milk scandal, we realized we were not eating safely.
sentences.chinese: 三鹿事件之後，我們意識到每天喫的食物並不安全。

sentences.english: Sanlu, no doubt, is just the tip of the iceberg.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，三鹿毒奶事件只是冰山一角。

sentences.english: Contaminants were found in Sanlu-brand milk formula, China's Ministry of Health said.
sentences.chinese: 中國衛生部表示，污染物在“三鹿”牌乳製品中發現。

sentences.english: The revelation set off worldwide recalls of Chinese products, from dairy goods to dog food, and bankrupted China’s biggest dairy company, Sanlu.
sentences.chinese: 中國最大的乳製品企業，三鹿集團因此破產倒閉。

sentences.english: The bankruptcy proceedings of Sanlu compony leads to the children suffered calculus facing zero compensation.
sentences.chinese: 三鹿破產程序裁定的終結導致結石患兒面臨零賠償。

definition: poisoned milk powder/refers to 2008 PRC scandal involving milk powder adulterated with melamine 三聚氰胺[san1 ju4 qing2 an4]
general term for milk packaged for the consumer, including long-life (UHT) milk, pasteurized milk and reconstituted milk
Xianchengduo, Chinese brand of orange-flavored soft drink
